Key Match Events: Argentina won 1-0 against Ecuador with goals from Angel di Maria (40') and Julián González (90+1')
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina are looking to claim a fourth consecutive victory, while Ecuador will try to return to winning ways
Lionel Scaloni's side will name an untried lineup, but still boast an array of talent
Ecuador's all-time leading goalscorer Enner Valencia will attempt to add to his 40-goal international tally
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina have gone on to claim 11 victories in 12 matches since lifting the World Cup in December 2022
Ecuador experienced mixed fortunes in their two friendly encounters during the March international window
